name: Low Berth, Ultimate Military Stasis Capsule
description: A berth for carrying a soldier in a stasis field for extended periods of time. Also provides suspended animation facilities when medical care or rescue is not immediately available. Displaces 1 ton. Offline power lasts 10,000 years; when connected to a central power supply, can safely preserve contents for perhaps a million years.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
